name: Nourishing & Repairing Foot Mask
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Hand Cream & Foot Cream
about: What it is:A pair of nourishing, repairing foot masks with a festive, limited-edition look..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.What Else You Need to Know:These limited-edition SEPHORA COLLECTION foot masks combine relaxation and holiday vibes. Their festive look is covered in stars, like an icy winter sky. They are formulated with 95 percent ingredients of natural origin and enriched with coconut extract.
ingredients: Aqua (Water), Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Betaine, Stearic Acid, Parfum (Fragrance), Carbomer, Arginine, O-Cymen-5-Ol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Xanthan Gum, Tocopherol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Cleanse and dry feet. .-Slip on masks as if they were socks. .-Leave on feet for 15 minutes. .-Remove masks and gently massage in any remaining product. .-No need to rinse. ..Precautions: .-Be careful not to slip, avoid walking with the foot masks on, and be sure to massage in any excess product after use.
